Title: A Friend of the Family
Writer: Vladimir Cvetko, Safia M. Dirie, Courtney A. Kemp (created by)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: The AUSA turns up the heat on Ghost and implicates his inner circle in on a RICO. Ghost and Tommy plan to frame Dre for the murder of Raymond Jones, Raina's killer, while Angela and Tasha enact a plan of their own.
